walks.title: The Original 10
walks.description: This walk takes in the 10 original ABC real ale pubs in and around the village. It is do-able, but it can be stressful on the feet and should only be attempted by the hardened drinker/walker

walks.title: The Original 10 + 2
walks.description: This is the same walk as the original 10, but there are 2 extra pubs which have since been added to the site, so it would be rude not to pay them a visit. Due to the time it may take, half pints might be the order of the day here.

walks.title: Bottom End, Top End and back
walks.description: This is the shortest walk but still takes in 7 pubs around the village. All road based with no real countryside though. Recommended if you have only a couple of hours to spare!

walks.title: Local Favourite
walks.description: This is a nice length of walk, 7 pubs and you can take this in a leisurely manner but does get muddy in places

walks.title: The Left Hand Side
walks.description: A middle distance walk taking in 8 pubs. Not too taxing on the feet and enough stops for everyone. Can get muddy in part.

walks.title: The Right Hand Side
walks.description: Similar distance to the left, but this now has 9 pubs again, good for drinkers and walkers of all levels!

walks.title: Three Spinners, Three Horses
walks.description: This walk is a longer walk, and still takes in a good number of pubs, but there is a longer section in the middle where you will go for a while with no pub visit.

walks.title: The Long One With Added Scenery
walks.description: This walk is a longer walk, and still takes in a good number of pubs, but there is a longer section in the middle where you will go for a while with no pub visit.

walks.title: The Road To Bolton And Back
walks.description: This walk is a longer walk, and still takes in a good number of pubs, but there is a longer section in the middle where you will go for a while with no pub visit.

walks.title: Little Scotland
walks.description: This walk is a longer walk, and still takes in a good number of pubs, but there is a longer section in the middle where you will go for a while with no pub visit.

walks.title: Worthington
walks.description: This walk is a longer walk, and still takes in a good number of pubs, but there is a longer section in the middle where you will go for a while with no pub visit.

walks.title: Little Scotland And Worthington
walks.description: This walk is a longer walk, and still takes in a good number of pubs, but there is a longer section in the middle where you will go for a while with no pub visit.
